strings.Value: "It hurts so deeply to lose a friend…"
"Life is so fragile, isn't it? One moment you live, the next you're gone..."
"One more spark, extinguished… One more soul gone to Pharasma's trial, in my god's pale gloam…"
"Don't cry. Seeing you crying makes me feel empty inside."
"I know not how to comfort you. But if you don't mind, I'll just sit here with you. Do you know how the saying goes? A sorrow shared is half a sorrow, a hope shared is hope twice over."
"Stop whining. — I said, stop whining! When you're so upset, I grow restless!"
"Naaa. Life is for tough stuff. If you survive — then you are worth!"
"I know you've had your share of bitter losses in your life..."
"I know you've had your share of bitter losses in your life..."
